00020    /*
00021    * Default constructor.
00022    */
00023    Average::Average(int blockFactor)
00024     : AverageStage(blockFactor),
00025       ParamComposite(),
00026       descendants_(),
00027       blockSum_(0.0),
00028       iBlock_(0),
00029       nSamplePerBlock_(0)
00030    {
00031       // Register self as first "descendant" AverageStage.
00032       descendants_.push_back(this);
00033    }
00034 
00035    Average::~Average()
00036    {}

00038    /*
00039    * Reset all accumulators and counters to zero.
00040    */
00041    void Average::clear()
00042    {
00043 
00044       blockSum_ = 0;
00045       iBlock_   = 0;
00046       AverageStage::clear();
00047    }

00049    /*
00050    * Read nSamplePerBlock from file.
00051    */
00052    void Average::readParam(std::istream& in)
00053    {
00054       readBegin(in, "Average");
00055       read<int>(in, "nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00056       readEnd(in);
00057    }
00058 
00059    /*
00060    * Set nSamplePerBlock parameter.
00061    */
00062    void Average::setNSamplePerBlock(int nSamplePerBlock)
00063    {
00064       nSamplePerBlock_ = nSamplePerBlock;
00065    }

00067    /*
00068    * Add a sampled value to the ensemble.
00069    */
00070    void Average::sample(double value)
00071    {
00072       std::ostream* outFilePtr = 0;
00073       sample(value, outFilePtr);
00074    }
00075 
00076    /*
00077    * Add a sampled value to the ensemble (private method)
00078    *
00079    * If outFilePtr != 0, output block averages to outFilePtr
00080    */
00081    void Average::sample(double value, std::ostream* outFilePtr)
00082    {
00083 
00084       // Add value to parent class
00085       AverageStage::sample(value);
00086 
00087       // Process block average for output
00088       if (nSamplePerBlock_ && outFilePtr) {
00089 
00090          // Increment block accumulators
00091          blockSum_  += value;
00092          ++iBlock_;
00093 
00094          if (iBlock_ == nSamplePerBlock_) {
00095 
00096             // Output block average to file
00097             *outFilePtr << Dbl(blockSum_/double(nSamplePerBlock_))
00098                         << std::endl;
00099 
00100             // Reset block accumulators
00101             blockSum_ = 0.0;
00102             iBlock_  = 0;
00103 
00104          }
00105       }
00106    }
00107 
00108    /*
00109    * Output statistical properties to file
00110    */
00111    void Average::output(std::ostream& out)
00112    {
00113 
00114       // Find first stage (descending) with nSample >= 16
00115       AverageStage* ptr = 0;
00116       int n = descendants_.size();
00117       int i = n;
00118       int nSample = 1;
00119       while (nSample < 16 && i > 0) {
00120          --i;
00121          ptr = descendants_[i];
00122          nSample = ptr->nSample();
00123       }
00124 
00125       double error  = ptr->error();
00126       double sigma  = error/sqrt(double(nSample));
00127       double weight = 1.0/(sigma*sigma);
00128       double sum    = error*weight;
00129       double norm   = weight;
00130       double aveErr = error;
00131       double oldSig;
00132 
00133       // Find weighted average within plateau
00134       bool next = true;
00135       while (next && i > 0) {
00136          oldSig = sigma;
00137          --i;
00138          ptr = descendants_[i];
00139          error = ptr->error();
00140          if (fabs(error - aveErr) < 2.0*oldSig) {
00141             nSample = ptr->nSample();
00142             sigma  = error/sqrt(double(nSample));
00143             weight = 1.0/(sigma*sigma);
00144             sum   += error*weight;
00145             norm  += weight;
00146             aveErr = sum/norm;
00147          } else {
00148             next = false;
00149          }
00150       }
00151 
00152       out <<  "Average   " << Dbl(average())         
00153           <<  "  +- " << Dbl(aveErr, 9, 2) << std::endl;
00154       out <<  "Variance  " << Dbl(variance())        << std::endl;
00155       out <<  "Std Dev   " << Dbl(stdDeviation())    << std::endl;
00156       out <<  std::endl;
00157 
00158       out << "Hierarchichal Error Analysis:" << std::endl;
00159       int interval;
00160       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00161          ptr = descendants_[i];
00162          error    = ptr->error();
00163          nSample  = ptr->nSample();
00164          interval = ptr->stageInterval();
00165          if (nSample >= 16) {
00166             out << Int(i) 
00167                 << Int(interval) 
00168                 << Dbl(error) 
00169                 << Dbl(error/sqrt(double(nSample)))
00170                 << Int(nSample) << std::endl;
00171          }
00172       }
00173       out << std::endl;
00174 
00175    }

00177    /*
00178    * Append pointer to a descendant to descendants_ array.
00179    */
00180    void Average::registerDescendant(AverageStage* descendantPtr)
00181    {  descendants_.push_back(descendantPtr); }
